title: Certificate error or Secure Connection Failed
content: we are using defence travel system website. earlier there was no issue in website but after updating the mozilla firefox it is showing secure connection failed. Error code: SSL_ERROR_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE_ALERT. same website is opening in other browser but not opening in mozilla. we have tried many times to install certificate of that website. The certificate is valid up to 2027. kindly do needful ASAP.
creator: dpro2

title: Unable to restore bookmark folders
content:
Hello,

My bookmark folders (containing all my bookmarks) disappeared in this latest update. I followed the instructions indicating how to restore my bookmarks, selecting the date I wanted to restore from - but it didn't work. I got an error message saying, "Unable to process the backup file." How can I get all my bookmarks back?

Thank you!
creator: rsheller

title: YouTube Premium download on Windows 10 PC
content: I am a subscriber of YouTube Premium. Q1: I downloaded a streaming video and closed and reopened Firefox. I recognized the one I downloaded from the list of YouTube links on Firefox. Thus, I could replay the video from the link. Now, I am supposed to be able to play the video offline or without an internet connection. But if I unplug the network cable from the machine and launch Firefox, nothing on the screen, including the video link. Q2: Where is the downloaded video file saved?
creator: khonjo1

title: Downloading an image
content: I subscribe to Shutterstock, but though the image selection is excellent, I'm having problems finding the option to save or save as, so I can't successfully download them and insert them in the text of my post. What's the fix for this?
